data.title: WBT Charlotte's News Talk
data.text:
Tune in here to this Tuesday edition of the Brett Winterble Show! Brett kicks off the program by talking about the ongoing debate surrounding President Biden’s leadership amidst concerns over age-related cognitive decline. He dives into the nuances of Democratic Party dynamics, discussing how these concerns are perceived differently by the public versus Democratic elites. […]

In a recent speech at a church, North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson said we have owe a debt to fellow Americans who died for our liberty. He cited the evil of the Nazis and Imperialist Japan and said "Some people need killing." The NC Democrats seized on that line to instill fear in their voters that Robinson wants to kill them. Plus, we play a MASH clip.

Brett Jensen fills in for Bo Thompson and Beth Troutman on Good Morning BT. 6:05 Brett Jensen and Jim Szoke In For Bo and Beth 6:20 Myrtle Beach To More Strictly Enforce Curfew For Minors 6:35 Harper’s Restaurant Closing In South Park 6:50 RAM Biz Update; LSU Offering “Commuter Stipend” To Incoming Freshman […]

Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson appeared at a church before Independence Day and talked about how we, as Americans, have a debt to pay to all those who died for our liberty. He talked about how Americans used to know that evil - like the Nazis - needed to be killed. Leftists are outraged.

This episode is presented by Carolina Readiness Supply – Democrats and the media (but I repeat myself) are having quite a moment after learning that conservative think tanks have ideas on how to overhaul the federal government based on conservative principles.

Tune in here to this Monday edition of the Brett Winterble Show! Brett kicks off the program by talking about the White House being under the control of Biden’s staff and the leaders of the democratic party while Biden is quickly becoming less cognizant of the world around them. Our White House, the home of […]

Tune in here to this ​Monday edition of Breaking With Brett Jensen! Breaking Brett Jensen kicks the show off by talking about his round of golf yesterday where he met two guys, one named Steve and the other named Martin. The group was held up by two groups in front of them that kept loosing […]

Tune in here to this Monday edition of the Brett Winterble Show! We’re joined by Gunnery Sargent and Executive Director of Veterans for Trump, Jessie Jane Duff, to talk about the chaos we’re seeing in the democratic party and who is actually running the show. While White House aids and other democrats have assured the […]
